# **Analysis of longitudinal data**

*This is the last chapter of the IODS course. I will do analysis on a longitudinal data set and intepret the results.*

```{r}
date()

library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

BPRS <- read.csv(file = "C:/LocalData/inkaronk/IODS-project/BPRS.csv", header = TRUE)
RATS <- read.csv(file = "C:/LocalData/inkaronk/IODS-project/RATS.csv", header = TRUE)

BPRS$treatment <- factor(BPRS$treatment)
BPRS$subject <- factor(BPRS$subject)
RATS$ID <- factor(RATS$ID)
RATS$Group <- factor(RATS$Group)

BPRSL <-  BPRS %>% gather(key = weeks, value = bprs, -treatment, -subject)
BPRSL <-  BPRSL %>% mutate(week = as.integer(substr(weeks,5,5)))

RATSL <- RATS %>%
  gather(key = WD, value = Weight, -ID, -Group) %>%
  mutate(Time = as.integer(substr(WD,3,4))) 

```
